name: ORS Police Intelligence Unit Adjudications Detail Report
description:
This report displays all adjudications for a prisoner for all bookings. It includes details and results of each adjudication. Optional Date Range available.
ADJ0013- v00.00.01 Last Modified: 23/09/2019

dataset.name: Adjudications
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_AGENCY_INCIDENTS.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID, AT_AGENCY_INCIDENTS.REPORT_DATE, OMS_OWNER_OIC_HEARINGS3.OIC_INCIDENT_ID, AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_CHARGES.OIC_CHARGE_ID, AT_OIC_OFFENCES.DESCRIPTION, AT_AGENCY_INCIDENTS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_AGENCY_INCIDENTS.INCIDENT_DETAILS FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INCIDENTS AT_AGENCY_INCIDENTS, OMS_OWNER.OIC_HEARINGS OMS_OWNER_OIC_HEARINGS3, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INCIDENT_CHARGES AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_CHARGES, OMS_OWNER.OIC_OFFENCES AT_OIC_OFFENCES, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INCIDENT_PARTIES AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_PARTIES WHERE (AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_PARTIES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_AGENCY_INCIDENTS.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_PARTIES.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID) AND (AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_PARTIES.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_CHARGES.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID AND AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_PARTIES.PARTY_SEQ = AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_CHARGES.PARTY_SEQ) AND (AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_CHARGES.CHARGED_OIC_OFFENCE_ID = AT_OIC_OFFENCES.OIC_OFFENCE_ID) AND (SUBSTR(AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_CHARGES.OIC_CHARGE_ID, 1, (INSTR(AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_CHARGES.oic_charge_id, '/') - 1)) = OMS_OWNER_OIC_HEARINGS3.OIC_INCIDENT_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = 'A0657AL'), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID, REPORT_DATE, OIC_INCIDENT_ID, OIC_CHARGE_ID, DESCRIPTION, AGY_LOC_ID, INCIDENT_DETAILS, V_MAX_NAME || ',' || ' ' || V_MAX_FIRSTNAME AS V_CONCAT_NAME FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Award
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_OIC_SANCTIONS.OIC_SANCTION_CODE, AT_OFFENDER_OIC_SANCTIONS.COMPENSATION_AMOUNT, AT_OFFENDER_OIC_SANCTIONS.SANCTION_DAYS, AT_OFFENDER_OIC_SANCTIONS.COMMENT_TEXT, AT_OFFENDER_OIC_SANCTIONS.STATUS, AT_OIC_HEARING_RESULTS.FINDING_CODE, AT_AGENCY_INCIDENTS.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_OIC_SANCTIONS AT_OFFENDER_OIC_SANCTIONS, OMS_OWNER.OIC_HEARING_RESULTS AT_OIC_HEARING_RESULTS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INCIDENTS AT_AGENCY_INCIDENTS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INCIDENT_PARTIES AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_PARTIES, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INCIDENT_CHARGES AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_CHARGES WHERE (AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_PARTIES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_AGENCY_INCIDENTS.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_PARTIES.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID) AND (AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_PARTIES.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_CHARGES.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID AND AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_PARTIES.PARTY_SEQ = AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_CHARGES.PARTY_SEQ) AND (AT_OFFENDER_OIC_SANCTIONS.OIC_HEARING_ID (+) = AT_OIC_HEARING_RESULTS.OIC_HEARING_ID AND AT_OFFENDER_OIC_SANCTIONS.RESULT_SEQ (+) = AT_OIC_HEARING_RESULTS.RESULT_SEQ) AND (AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_CHARGES.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID = AT_OIC_HEARING_RESULTS.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID AND AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_CHARGES.CHARGE_SEQ = AT_OIC_HEARING_RESULTS.CHARGE_SEQ) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = 'A0657AL'), dataset_ AS (SELECT OIC_SANCTION_CODE, COMPENSATION_AMOUNT, SANCTION_DAYS, COMMENT_TEXT, STATUS, FINDING_CODE, AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Adj with no Offence ID
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER.LAST_NAME, AT_AGENCY_INCIDENTS.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID, AT_AGENCY_INCIDENTS.INCIDENT_DETAILS, AT_AGENCY_INCIDENTS.REPORT_DATE, AT_AGENCY_INCIDENTS.AGY_LOC_ID FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDERS AT_OFFENDER, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INCIDENTS AT_AGENCY_INCIDENTS, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_INCIDENT_PARTIES AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_PARTIES WHERE (AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_PARTIES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (AT_AGENCY_INCIDENTS.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID = AT_AGENCY_INCIDENT_PARTIES.AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID) AND AT_OFFENDER.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY = 'A0657AL'), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, FIRST_NAME, LAST_NAME, AGENCY_INCIDENT_ID, INCIDENT_DETAILS, REPORT_DATE, AGY_LOC_ID FROM dataset_base_)

errors.error: Report Variant 167740.RS does not have corresponding dataset undefined
